      • registerAction

        protected ActionConfig registerAction(java.lang.Class actionClass,
                                      java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod,
                                      ActionDef actionDef)
        Registers actions and applies proxetta on actions that are not already registered. We need to define ActionDef before we apply the proxy, using target action class.
        Overrides:
        registerAction in class ActionsManager
